author: gstein
msg: rolling 0.13.1

author: gstein
msg: Fix VPATH builds by gathering up more paths where objects might be
located.
* build/gen_base.py (_GeneratorBase.__init__): look at the sources
patterns for relative paths.

author: dws
msg: * packages/rpm/subversion.spec : Argh; There *is* a problem when doing a
"clean" build (a build without /usr/lib/* stuff already installed). The
subversion.spec file was not detecting that some of the DLL libraries
were not being built.  This change fixes that problem.  Also because of
this, I've reverted the part of r2286 that took out the -L options until
we can figure out why it is not building properly without the -L options.

author: brane
msg: Ongoing work on the delta combiner (issue #531).
* compose_delta (copy_source_ops): Accept new parameter, target_offset,
and use it when generating an overlapping target copy.
Correct offset and range calculation for transposing the repeating pattern
in an overlapping copy.
* random-test.c (do_random_combine_test): Rename from random_combine_test,
and add a mechanism to report the last seed used.
(random_combine_test): New. Wrapper for do_random_combine_test.

author: joe
msg: * subversion.spec: Fix typo in %description.
